entry.source: I need to have a certain person protected.{F801}There is no place for him in the Eastern{F801}Kingdom of Mikado any longer, so he is hiding{F801}within Kiccigiorgi Forest. I have heard of a man{F801}named Fujiwara, who I feel can take care of{F801}him. Could you escort this man to {F804,5}Fujiwara?{F804,0}{F801}
